00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 using System.IO;
00025 
00026 using Niry;
00027 using Niry.Utils;
00028 using Niry.Network;
00029 using Niry.GUI.Gtk2;
00030 
00031 using NyFolder;
00032 using NyFolder.GUI;
00033 using NyFolder.Utils;
00034 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00035 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00036 using NyFolder.PluginLib;
00037 
00038 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.DownloadManager {
00040     public class DownloadManager : Plugin {
00041         // ============================================
00042         // PUBLIC Const
00043         // ============================================
00044 
00045         // ============================================
00046         // PRIVATE Members
00047         // ============================================
00048         private ViewerWindow viewerWindow = null;
00049         private INyFolder nyFolder = null;
00050 
00051         // ============================================
00052         // PUBLIC Constructors
00053         // ============================================
00055         public DownloadManager() {
00056             // Initialize Plugin Info
00057             this.pluginInfo = new Info();
00058 
00059             // Initialize Talk Stock
00060             Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf;
00061             pixbuf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(null, "Download.png");
00062             StockIcons.AddToStock("Download", pixbuf);
00063             StockIcons.AddToStockImages("Download", pixbuf);
00064 
00065             pixbuf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(null, "Upload.png");
00066             StockIcons.AddToStockImages("Upload", pixbuf);
00067 
00068             pixbuf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(null, "DlTrash.png");
00069             StockIcons.AddToStockImages("DlTrash", pixbuf);
00070         }
00071 
00072         // ============================================
00073         // PUBLIC Methods
00074         // ============================================
00076         public override void Initialize (INyFolder iNyFolder) {
00077             this.nyFolder = iNyFolder;
00078 
00079             // Initialize GUI Events
00080             this.nyFolder.MainWindowStarted += new BlankEventHandler(OnMainWindowStarted);
00081             this.nyFolder.MainWindowClosed += new BlankEventHandler(OnMainWindowClosed);
00082         }
00083 
00085         public override void Uninitialize() {
00086         }
00087 
00088         // ============================================
00089         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00090         // ============================================
00091         private void OnMainWindowStarted (object sender) {
00092             // Initialize GUI Components
00093             InitializeMenu();
00094 
00095             // Initialize Sensitive Menu
00096             P2PManager.StatusChanged += new BoolEventHandler(OnP2PStatusChanged);
00097             SetSensitiveMenu(P2PManager.IsListening());
00098         }
00099 
00100         private void OnMainWindowClosed (object sender) {
00101             OnDlWinClose(null, null);
00102         }
00103 
00104         private void OnP2PStatusChanged (object sender, bool isOnline) {
00105             if (nyFolder.MainWindow != null)
00106                 SetSensitiveMenu(isOnline);
00107         }
00108 
00109         private void OnDlManager (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00110             if (viewerWindow == null) {
00111                 viewerWindow = new ViewerWindow();
00112                 viewerWindow.DeleteEvent += new DeleteEventHandler(OnDlWinClose);
00113                 viewerWindow.ShowAll();
00114             }
00115             viewerWindow.GrabFocus();
00116         }
00117 
00118         private void OnDlWinClose (object sender, DeleteEventArgs args) {
00119             if (viewerWindow != null) {
00120                 viewerWindow.DeleteEvent += new DeleteEventHandler(OnDlWinClose);
00121                 viewerWindow.Destroy();
00122             }
00123             viewerWindow = null;
00124         }
00125 
00126         // ============================================
00127         // PRIVATE Methods
00128         // ============================================
00129         private void InitializeMenu() {
00130             ActionEntry[] entries = new ActionEntry[] {
00131                 new ActionEntry("DownloadManager", "Download", "Download Manager", null, 
00132                                 "Open Download Manager", new EventHandler(OnDlManager))
00133             };
00134 
00135             string ui = "<ui>" +
00136                         "  <menubar name='MenuBar'>" +
00137                         "    <menu action='ToolMenu'>" +
00138                         "      <menuitem action='DownloadManager' />" +
00139                         "    </menu>" +
00140                         "  </menubar>" +
00141                         "</ui>";
00142 
00143             nyFolder.MainWindow.Menu.AddMenus(ui, entries);
00144         }
00145 
00146         private void SetSensitiveMenu (bool sensitive) {
00147             nyFolder.MainWindow.Menu.SetSensitive("/MenuBar/ToolMenu/DownloadManager", sensitive);
00148         }
00149 
00150         // ============================================
00151         // PUBLIC Properties
00152         // ============================================
00153     }
00154 }
